sentence.text: Possible candidate genes in 6q14 for intellectual disability might be FILIP1, DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator, HTR1B, and SNX14

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator

sentence.text: 6q14 deletions have been associated with intellectual disability and a distinct pattern of minor anomalies, including upslanted palpebral fissures with epicanthal folds, a short nose with broad nasal biological_process, anteverted nares, long philtrum, and thin upper lip.
